wordGroup: martial art 武术（源于东方的几种搏斗技巧）
martial law 戒严令；戒严法；军事管制

sentences.en: All the men now face court martial.
sentences.cn: 现在所有这些军人都面临军事法庭的审判。

sentences.en: He was convicted at a court martial.
sentences.cn: 他在军事法庭上被判有罪。

sentences.en: Diaz is a fitness freak who's trained in martial arts.
sentences.cn: 迪亚斯是个受过武术训练的健身迷。
